<ng-container *ngIf="containerList">
  <ng-container *ngFor="let containerIndex of objKey(containerList)">
    <lb9-dynamic-container
            [containerCreation]="containerList[containerIndex]"
            [data]="data"
            [actionDataIndex]="rowIndex"
            [containerIndex]="containerIndex"
            [option]="option"
            [reRenderField]="_reRenderFieldList"
            (callBack)="processCallBack($event)"
            (panelCallBack)="processPanelCallBack($event)">

    </lb9-dynamic-container>
  </ng-container>
</ng-container>
